contentrichtext.text: {{Refimprove|date=August 2011}} {{Infobox protected area of Australia | name = Ben Halls Gap National Park | iucn_category = Ia | image = | caption = | map = | map_caption = | locator_x = | locator_y = | location = | nearest_town_or_city = |coordinates = {{Coord|31|37|11|S|151|11|6|E|type:landmark_region:AU-NSW|display=inline,title}} | area = {{Convert|3018|ha|abbr=on}}<ref name="ParkAreas">{{cite journal|title=Department of Environment Climate Change and Water Annual Report 2009-10|publisher=Department of Environment Climate Change and Water|date=November 2010|issn=1838-5958|pages=274â€“275|url=http://www.environment.nsw.gov.au/whoweare/deccwar10.htm}}</ref> | established = 1995 | visitation_num = | visitation_year = | managing_authorities = [[National Parks and Wildlife Service (New South Wales)|NSW National Parks and Wildlife Service]] | official_site = }} '''Ben Halls Gap National Park''' is a national park in [[New South Wales]], [[Australia]], 251 km<ref name=DistfromSyd>{{cite web|url=http://www.ga.gov.au/bin/distancedraw2?rec1=106819&placename=ben+halls+gap&placetype=0&state=NSW&place1=SYDNEY&place1long=151.209595&place1lat=-33.873199|title=Great Circle Distance between SYDNEY and BEN HALLS GAP NATIONAL PARK|accessdate=11 August 2011|publisher=Commonwealth of Australia|work=Geosciences Australia website}}</ref> north of [[Sydney]]. ==See also== * [[Protected areas of New South Wales]] ==References== {{reflist}} {{National Parks of New South Wales}} {{Use dmy dates|date=August 2011}} [[Category:National parks of New South Wales]] [[Category:Protected areas established in 1995]] [[Category:1995 establishments in Australia]] {{NewSouthWales-protected-area-stub}}
